mapper.sql: select r_drama_no, count(r_drama_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_drama_view group by r_drama_no
mapper.select:
/* 메인 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_d.title as dramaTitle , tb_d.link as link , concat(tb_d_t_i.file_path, '/', tb_d_t_i.file_name) as fileFullPath , ifnull(tb_d_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_drama as tb_d left outer join () as tb_d_v on tb_d.r_drama_no = tb_d_v.r_drama_no left outer join web_app_test2.tb_drama_thumbnail_img as tb_d_t_i on tb_d.r_drama_no = tb_d_t_i.r_drama_no where tb_d.use_yn = 'y' order by viewCnt desc limit 2

/* 전체 드라마 개수 조회 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test2.tb_drama where use_yn = 'y'
mapper.delete:
/* 디비에 쌓여있는 전체 드라마 삭제 쿼리 */
delete from web_app_test2.tb_drama
mapper.select:
/* 전체 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select r_drama_no as dramaNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as dramaTitle , author as dramaAuthor , link as link , broadcast_state as broadcastStateEnum , date_format(drama_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as dramaRegDt , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama where use_yn = 'y' order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

/* 전체 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리(pagination) */
select r_drama_no as dramaNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as dramaTitle , author as dramaAuthor , link as link , broadcast_state as broadcastStateEnum , date_format(drama_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as dramaRegDt , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama where use_yn = 'y' order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

/* 단일 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_d.r_drama_no as dramaNo , tb_d.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_d.title as dramaTitle , tb_d.author as dramaAuthor , tb_d.link as link , tb_d.broadcast_state as broadcastStateEnum , ifnull(tb_d_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , concat(tb_d_t_i.file_path, '/', tb_d_t_i.file_name) as fileFullPath , date_format(tb_d.drama_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as dramaRegDt , date_format(tb_d.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama as tb_d left outer join ()as tb_d_v on tb_d.r_drama_no = tb_d_v.r_drama_no left outer join web_app_test2.tb_drama_thumbnail_img as tb_d_t_i on tb_d.r_drama_no = tb_d_t_i.r_drama_no where tb_d.use_yn = 'y' and tb_d.r_drama_no = #{dramaNo} order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc
